documentation.content:
[View JobSet details](https://console.cloud.google.com/kubernetes/aiml/deployments/jobset/${metric_or_resource.label.project_id}/${CLUSTER_KIND}/${metric_or_resource.label.location}/${metric_or_resource.label.cluster_name}/${metric_or_resource.label.namespace_name}/${JOBSET_NAME}/observability?project=${metric_or_resource.label.project_id}).
- To learn how to configure TPUs for GKE [view the documentation](https://cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine/docs/concepts/plan-tpus)

conditions.displayName: TPU Tensorcore Utilization is high for: ${JOBSET_NAME}

conditionThreshold.filter: resource.type = "k8s_container" AND metric.type = "kubernetes.io/container/accelerator/tensorcore_utilization" AND resource.labels.project_id="${metric_or_resource.label.project_id}" AND resource.labels.cluster_name="${metric_or_resource.label.cluster_name}" AND resource.labels.location="${metric_or_resource.label.location}" AND resource.labels.namespace_name="${metric_or_resource.label.namespace_name}" AND metadata.user_labels."jobset.sigs.k8s.io/jobset-name"="${JOBSET_NAME}"
